posts.post_content:
Amazingly, I am down to my last [STRIKE]seven[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]six[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]five[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]three[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]two[/STRIKE] ONE Helmar Stamp[STRIKE]s[/STRIKE] needed for completion of the set!

I need the following:

Babe Adams
[STRIKE]Jimmy Austin[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Art Fromme[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Otto Knabe[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Earl Moore[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Slim Sallee[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Cy Young[/STRIKE]

I would also love to upgrade each of the following:

Red Ames
George Bell
Bob Bescher
[STRIKE]Ping Bodie[/STRIKE]
Mordecai Brown
Jake Daubert
Steve Evans
Fred Toney
Irv Young

I have around 60 duplicate Helmars that I am okay with selling and/or trading.  Please PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url].  If there are any you need/want, give me a holler:

Jimmy Archer, Neal Ball, Fred Beck, Ping Bodie, Roger Bresnahan, Al Bridwell, Donie Bush, Bobby Byrne, Jim Delahanty, Wild Bill Donovan, Louis Drucke, Russ Ford, Roy Golden, Hank Gowdy, Peaches Graham, Dick Hoblitzell, John Hummel, Davy Jones, Paddy Livingston, Sherry Magee, George McBride, Amby McConnell, George Mullin, Marty O'Toole, Fred Parent, Nap Rucker, Boss Schmidt, Jim Scott, Jimmy Sheckard, Fred Snodgrass, Harry Stovall, Gabby Street, William Sullivan, Ira Thomas, Terry Turner, Bobby Wallace, Hooks Wiltse++

images of each (front and back) can be found at [url]http://imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum[/url]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20Bush.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20Byrne.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20Delahanty.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20Graham.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20Hummel.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20Mullin.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20Wallace.jpg[/IMG]
bump - down to six left to complete the set!
now down to my last five.  Help a brother out!

and then there were three...

Only need Babe Adams, Otto Knabe, and Cy Young for set completion!

bump.

Still looking for these last three.  I got my first one (Cobb) about five years ago, bought a whole bunch from Brian Campf (RIP) a few months later and I've been stuck on these last three for a while now.

Again, plenty of trade bait to get a deal done.

Down to TWO for set completion!  

Babe Adams and Cy Young, you guys need to come to your new home to hang with all your old friends!!

Awesome finish to 2019 as I was able to cross off the big one!  Cy Young has officially found his way to AZ!

Only need a Babe Adams for set completion.  Hopefully 2020 will be the year that I finally slay my first pre-war set!

Shouldn't be too hard, right?
Derek I have Bell. Not sure if it would be an upgrade .
Thanks for the effort Kenny.  Unfortunately, that one is trimmed pretty badly.  I like ones with all their white borders showing.
